Labs, Projects, People

The Pudding

Lisa Charlotte Rost

Uber Visualization Library
a WebGL-powered framework for visual exploratory data analysis of large datasets.

MIT Macroconnections Lab
...improve how teams, organizations, and nations learn.

MIT Senseable Cities Lab
Urban imagination and social innovation through design & science

MIT Civic Data Design Lab
“Big data” will not change the world unless it is collected and synthesized into tools that have a public benefit.

University of Washington Interactive Data Lab
Led by Jeff Heer, "enhance people's ability to understand and communicate data through the design of new interactive systems for data visualization and analysis."

Harvard Lab
The Visual Computing Group, led by Hanspeter Pfister
